item.title: BeXide announces Fruit Mountain Party for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/bexide-announces-fruit-mountain-party-for-pc

  • PC

A multiplayer entry in the Fruit Mountain series.

BeXide has announced Fruit Mountain Party, a multiplayer entry in its 3D puzzle game series Fruit Mountain. It will launch first in Early Access for PC via Steam. A release date was not announced.

The Early Access release will feature the core game systems, include single-player and multiplayer versus modes. The full version will implement updates to versus mode, as well as additional content for single-player mode and customization features, and other adjustments and content based on user feedback. It is expected to remain in Early Access for approximately three months.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

A brand new game in the hit 3D puzzle game Fruit Mountain where you combine fruits to make them bigger is finally here!

This time, it’s fruit battles!? There are plenty of versus modes that everyone can enjoy!

Get together for online or local multiplayer and have a blast!

Keep stacking those fruits!

Key Features

  • Heated Online Battle Mode
    • Compete with friends and players from around the world in a battle mode for up to four players!
    • Will you compete in a serious time attack? Or maybe a chaotic battle full of items and unexpected accidents?
    • Get ready for exciting matches with a variety of rules!
  • Single-Player Mode Supports Rankings
    • The single-player mode is still available!
    • Compete with players from around the world for the highest score!
  • Easy to Play
    • Simply throw fruits and stack them on the plate.
    • Combine fruits of the same kind to make them bigger!
    • Game over if the fruits fall off the plate!
    • Create big fruits or trigger chains to boost your score with combo!
    • Hone your stacking skills and compete with your rivals!

Watch the announcement trailer below.

item.title: ‘Lightning-fast real-time strategy game’ Jelly Troops adds Switch version
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/lightning-fast-real-time-strategy-game-jelly-troops-adds-switch-version

  • PC
  • Switch

Weekend PC playtest begins March 6.

“Lightning-fast pick-up-and-play real-time strategy game” Jelly Troops will launch for Switch alongside its previously announced PC (Steam) version in 2025, publisher Phoenixx and developer Nukenin announced. A playtest will be available for PC this weekend, starting March 6 at 5:00 p.m. PT / 8:00 p.m. ET. It will also be playable at Tokyo Indie Games Summit 2025 from March 8 to 9.

“Jelly Troops‘ development process continues on a firm foundation of community feedback,” said Nukenin solo developer waken in a press release. “Previous playtests have informed development, and the next iteration is ready for another feedback gauntlet. Please try out the latest version on Steam. We also look forward to further testing with attendees at Tokyo Indie Games Summit!”

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

An online action real-time strategy game where the tide can turn in a flash!

Fight exciting battles where you recruit golems to battle your opponent’s slimes, cleverly redirect their slimes with walls, or sneakily steal their flag to make a dramatic comeback.

Easy to Play, Hard to Master

Unlike traditional real-time strategy games, Jelly Troops doesn’t have complex units or resource management, so anyone can pick it up and play. Every battle is different. Should you get more slimes, capture the flag, or send your guardians to punish your opponent? It’s up to you!

Key Features

  • An easy real-time strategy game that anyone can play.
  • Fast-paced action.
  • Sneaky capture-the-flag gameplay.
  • Cute visuals and animations.
  • Quick matches.
  • Highly replayable.
  • Play against your friends or match with random players anywhere in the world.
  • Split-screen two-player battles.
